content: this crochet pattern nativity set will add a beautiful eco-friendly sustainable and festive holiday touch to your home decor this year this crochet nativity scene is perfect for the ambitious beginner to show off your crochet skills with this as the centerpiece of your christmas holiday home decor this pattern is written in us terms upon purchase you will receive a beautiful 19-page pdf pattern ready for download the pattern is easy and approachable and includes several photos to help you along the way over 80 i am always available to help as well size using a 2 75mm crochet hook and light worsted/dk weight yarn the characters of this adorable nativity set will be about 4 tall __________ join me subscribe to the off the beaten hook community for free patterns video tutorials and printable guides & resources blog https //offthebeatenhook com/ instagram https //www instagram com/offthebeatenhook/ facebook https //www facebook com/offthebeatenhook pinterest https //www pinterest com/offthebeatenhook youtube https //www youtube com/@offthebeatenhook2985 this pattern is for personal use only this pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced resold distributed published altered translated posted or shared without authorization you can sell your finished items provided that you credit off the beaten hook as the designer but you may not use my photos for your listing
